name: Xml.Decode

values.name: decode
values.comment:
Try to decode a string and turn it into an XML value
    >>> import Xml.Encode exposing (Value(Tag, Object), null)
    >>> import Dict
    >>> decode "<name></name>"
    Ok (Object [Tag "name" Dict.empty null])

values.name: decodeBool
values.comment: Decode a bool

values.name: decodeChildren
values.comment:
Decode children from a string

    >>> import Xml.Encode exposing (Value(Object, Tag, StrNode))
    >>> decodeChildren "<name>hello</name>"
    Ok (Object [Tag "name" Dict.empty (StrNode "hello")] )

values.name: decodeFloat
values.comment:
Decode a float
    >>> import Xml.Encode exposing (Value(FloatNode))
    >>> decodeFloat "hello"
    Err "could not convert string 'hello' to a Float"

    >>> decodeFloat "5"
    Ok (FloatNode 5.0)

    >>> decodeFloat "5.5"
    Ok (FloatNode 5.5)

values.name: decodeInt
values.comment:
Decode a int
    >>> import Xml.Encode exposing (Value(IntNode))
    >>> decodeInt "hello"
    Err "could not convert string 'hello' to an Int"

    >>> decodeInt "5"
    Ok (IntNode 5)

values.name: decodeString
values.comment:
Decode a string

    >>> import Xml.Encode exposing (Value(StrNode))
    >>> decodeString "hello"
    Ok (StrNode "hello")

name: Xml.Query

values.name: bool
values.comment:
Try to turn a value into an int
    >>> bool (BoolNode True)
    Ok True

    >>> bool (StrNode "hello")
    Err "Not a bool"

values.name: collect
values.comment:
Collect as many values that pass the given converter

    >>> collect (tag "name" string) [Tag "name" Dict.empty (StrNode "noah")]
    [ "noah" ]

    >>> collect (tag "name" string) [Tag "name" Dict.empty (IntNode 5)]
    [ ]
values.type: (Xml.Encode.Value -> Result.Result String a) -> List Xml.Encode.Value -> List a

values.name: contains
values.comment: check if a XML value contains another XML value

values.name: default
values.comment:
Set a default for a result

    >> default "Cat" (Ok "Fish")
    Ok "Fish"

    >> default "Dog" (Err "flip")
    Ok "Dog"
values.type: b -> Result.Result a b -> Result.Result a b

values.name: float
values.comment:
Try to turn a value into an int
    >>> float (FloatNode 5.5)
    Ok 5.5

    >>> float (StrNode "hello")
    Err "Not a float"

values.name: int
values.comment:
Try to turn a value into an int
    >>> int (IntNode 5)
    Ok 5

    >>> int (StrNode "hello")
    Err "Not an int"

values.name: string
values.comment:
Try to turn a value into a string

    >>> string (IntNode 5)
    Err "Not a string."

    >>> string (StrNode "hello")
    Ok "hello"

values.name: tag
values.comment:
Try to get a given tag name out from an XML value, then grab the value from that
    Grabs the first tag that matches in the object

    >>> import Xml.Encode exposing (Value(..))

    >>> tag "name" string (Tag "name" Dict.empty (StrNode "noah"))
    Ok "noah"

    >>> tag "name" string (Tag "name" Dict.empty (IntNode 5))
    Err "Not a string."

    >>> tag "name" string (StrNode "noah")
    Err "No tag called 'name' found."
values.type: String -> (Xml.Encode.Value -> Result.Result String a) -> Xml.Encode.Value -> Result.Result String a

values.name: tags
values.comment:
Search an XML value for any tags matching

    >>> import Xml.Encode exposing (object, null, encode, Value(Tag, Object))
    >>> import Dict
    >>> object [ ("name", Dict.empty, null)] |> tags "name"
    [Tag "name" Dict.empty (Object []) ]

name: Xml.Encode

values.name: bool
values.comment: Encode an int

values.name: encode
values.comment: Take a value, then generate a string from it

values.name: float
values.comment: Encode an int

values.name: int
values.comment: Encode an int

values.name: null
values.comment: Empty contents

values.name: object
values.comment: Encode an "object" (a tag)
values.type: List ( String, Dict.Dict String Xml.Encode.Value, Xml.Encode.Value ) -> Xml.Encode.Value

values.name: string
values.comment: Encode an XML string
